name: Silent showcase
description:
Time passes and our exhibitions remain there, intact in the window of the world. We discreetly silence our deeds, create fences of distance between what we are and what we want to be, we let the surroundings overshadow our personality while we remain exposed until we are noticed. 

|| twitter @gricioariel || instagram @gricioariel ||  arielgricio.com.br || 
Photographer and visual artist from Brazil.

Digital photography | 2010.
São Paulo, Brazil
By Ariel Gricio
